content: Modern AI models like Gemini 3.1 and Claude 4.6 enable the creation of sophisticated geospatial intelligence systems that combine features of Google Earth and Palantir.

A sophisticated geospatial intelligence system can be built to include real-time plane and satellite tracking, real traffic camera feeds, and a functional traffic system with panoptic detection capabilities.
To enhance a geospatial intelligence system, integrate OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) data sources and a VLM (Vision-Language Model) integration.
It is more efficient to directly build a project than to spend extensive time in meetings and product reviews.
